name: design-pagine-statiche
description: Template HTML del progetto per la realizzazione dei siti web delle Scuole Italiane

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && cp -R src dist && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.documentation-deploy-to-gh-pages: npm run build && gh-pages -d dist -m 'chore: update documentation'
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && node scripts/wait-confirm && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: echo "You can now publish your tag with 'git push --follow-tags'"
scripts.populate: rm -rf website && mkdir website && cp -R assets website && node scripts/insertContent.js
scripts.include: rm -rf templates && mkdir templates && yarn gulp && rm -rf templates/includes
scripts.create-website: rm -rf website templates && mkdir website templates && cp -R src/assets website && yarn gulp && rm -rf templates/includes && node scripts/insertContent.js

author: Presidenza del Consiglio dei Ministri
